entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/comp_status
entry.label: Component status:
entry.help_brief: component status {Enabled; Disabled}

entry.label: Input directory:
entry.help_brief: input directory

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/out_directory
entry.label: Output directory:
entry.help_brief: output directory

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/site_prefix
entry.label: Site prefix:
entry.help_brief: file prefix for the study site

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/case_prefix
entry.label: Case prefix:
entry.help_brief: file prefix for the model scenario

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/n_steps
entry.label: Number of steps:
entry.help_brief: number of time steps

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/dt
entry.label: Time step:
entry.help_brief: channel process timestep [sec]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/code_file
entry.label: D8 flow code file:
entry.help_brief: grid of D8 flow codes in binary file [Jenson 84]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/slope_file
entry.label: D8 slope file:
entry.help_brief: grid of D8 slopes in binary file [m/m]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/MANNING
entry.label: Manning flag:
entry.help_brief: option to use Manning's n for roughness

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/LAW_OF_WALL
entry.label: Law of Wall flag:
entry.help_brief: option to use Law of Wall for roughness

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/nval_type
entry.label: Manning N type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/nval
entry.label: Manning N:
entry.help_brief: Manning's N values [s/m^(1/3)]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/z0val_type
entry.label: Roughness z0 type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/z0val
entry.label: Roughness z0:
entry.help_brief: Law-of-wall roughness values [m]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/width_type
entry.label: Bed width type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/width
entry.label: Bed width:
entry.help_brief: bottom width of trapezoid cross-section [m]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/angle_type
entry.label: Bank angle type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/angle
entry.label: Bank angle:
entry.help_brief: bank angle of trapezoid cross-section [deg]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/d0_type
entry.label: Init. depth type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/d0
entry.label: Init. depth:
entry.help_brief: initial flow depth [m] (if Scalar, use 0.0!)

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/sinu_type
entry.label: Sinuosity type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/sinu
entry.label: Sinuosity:
entry.help_brief: absolute channel sinuosity [m/m]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/save_grid_dt
entry.label: Save grid timestep:
entry.help_brief: time interval between saved grids [sec]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/SAVE_Q_GRIDS
entry.label: Save Q grids toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save computed Q grids {Yes; No}

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/Q_gs_file
entry.label: Save Q grids file:
entry.help_brief: filename for Q grid stack [m^3/s]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/SAVE_U_GRIDS
entry.label: Save u grids toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save computed u grids {Yes; No}

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/u_gs_file
entry.label: Save u grids file:
entry.help_brief: filename for u grid stack [m/s]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/SAVE_D_GRIDS
entry.label: Save d grids toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save computed d grids {Yes; No}

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/d_gs_file
entry.label: Save d grids file:
entry.help_brief: filename for d grid stack [m]

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/SAVE_F_GRIDS
entry.label: Save f grids toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save computed f grids {Yes; No}

entry.name: /ChannelsKinWave/Input/Var/f_gs_file
entry.label: Save f grids file:
entry.help_brief: filename for f grid stack [none]

entry.label: Save Q pixels file:
